mapper.select: SELECT biomass_boiler.*,company.company_name,company.address,company.county_id,county.COUNTY_NAME FROM biomass_boiler LEFT JOIN company ON biomass_boiler.com_id=company.com_id LEFT JOIN county ON company.county_id=county.COUNTY_ID where company.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
